raw_comment:
What do I notice?
I notice that the percentage of players of color in the Women's National Basketball Association in 2019 and the National Basketball Association in 2020 are the same, while the other charts in 2020 have lower percentages. 

What do I wonder?
I wonder why the Major League Baseball chart has the lowest percentage of players of color in 2020 than the other sports. 

What impact does this have on you and your community? 
This impacts my community because it shows that there are people of color able to play or be a part of a team in sports, but there are less numbers in the amount of head coaches of color that should be increasing in numbers as well.

What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea. 
"Diversity within major sports"
ace_sentences: The percentage of players of color in the Women's National Basketball Association in 2019 is the same as the percentage of players of color in the National Basketball Association in 2020.
The other charts in 2020 show lower percentages of players of color.
The Major League Baseball chart has the lowest percentage of players of color in 2020 among the sports.
I wonder why the Major League Baseball chart has the lowest percentage of players of color in 2020.
The graph shows that people of color can play in sports teams.
The graph also shows that the number of head coaches of color is lower than the number of players of color.
The number of head coaches of color should increase.
The headline is: Diversity within major sports.
